qrcode.title: qr code
qrcode.description: here is your qr code for the url: [click here]({url})

error.missingFields: please provide both title and content.

error.noReason: you forgot to give a reason!
error.maxReached: this user has hit the max of {max} flags.
error.noFlags: this user has no red flags.
error.notYourFlag: you're trying to remove a flag you never added.
error.noSelf: you can't add or remove red flags on yourself.
error.processing: an error occurred while processing the red flag request. please try again.

success.removed: your red flag was removed from {user}!
success.cleared: all red flags have been cleared from {user}!

check.title: red flags
check.description:
this user has {count} red flag{plural}!
**current status:** {status}
check.selfNote: **note:** these are the red flags on your account. if you think any are unfair, contact server admins.
check.footer: remember: users can remove their own flags, and admins can clear all flags.

hub.title: reminders
hub.footerNoTimezone: tip: set your timezone in `/profile` for accurate reminders

list.title: your reminders ({total} total)
list.description:
showing {start}-{end} of {total} reminders.

use the menu to edit or delete reminders.
list.empty:
you don't have any active reminders.

use `/reminder add` to create one.

error.maxReached:
you've reached the maximum of {max} reminders.

delete some reminders in `/reminder hub` to create more.
error.invalidDuration:
invalid duration format.

examples: `1h`, `30m`, `2d`, `1w`
defaults to 6 hours if not specified.
error.failed: failed to create reminder. try again later.

edit.title: edit reminder #{id}

error.tooLong: message must be 500 characters or less.

clear.title: delete all reminders?
clear.description:
are you sure you want to delete **all {count}** reminder{plural}?

this is **irreversible** and will remove all your active reminders.
clear.success:
deleted **{count}** reminder{plural}.

all your reminders have been removed.
clear.empty: you don't have any reminders to delete.
clear.footerAfterClear: use `/reminder add` to create new reminders

notification.title: reminder
notification.content: you asked me to remind you:
